DOC.brief_title: Study Of PF-03084014 In Combination With Gemcitabine And Nab-Paclitaxel In Patients With Metastatic Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma Not Previously Treated With Anticancer Therapies
DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically diagnosis metastatic ductal adenocarcinoma pancreas . No prior radiotherapy , surgery chemotherapy investigational therapy metastatic disease .
